description:
This course is about making a simple Photo enhanced to looking better and becomes attractive than others.

This tutorial is mainly focused on people who have less Photoshop experience and does not actually understand its complexities. I used easy techniques that can easy to learn and try.

In this course you will learn by watch my Laptop screen along with the audio explanation how each process is done.

This course includes very interactive Videos defining each part in detail with logics.

After finishing this course you will find significant improvement in your Photoshop photo editing skills significantly

The course is structured in Episodes starting for adjusting RAW photo in Camera RAW, Advance usage of selection tool, Adding cloudy sky, and Sunlight effect to balance the overall color tone of the image.And in last my exclusive techniques which I usually use before publishing Photo.

BONUS : I will also provide the RAW image used in the video so You can learn and apply that techniques that in my opinion will give you a assurance of proper understanding of the concepts.
title: Easy Photo Enhancement HDR Looks
